settings.name: Configure form settings
settings.description: Manage features that are unique to this form

settings.label: Form OID
settings.description: Variable name to identify this form

settings.label: Label
settings.description: As displayed to user. Usually the same as title

settings.label: Require edit reasoning for respondents
settings.description: Respondents must specify a reason when changing a response to a field in a form that's already been completed.

settings.label: Exclude this form in data exports
settings.description: This form will not be included when exporting the trial data.

settings.label: Require this form's source data to be reviewed
settings.description: The form will need its data reviewed by a study monitor. By enabling this, you are also giving all accounts with a study monitor role access to view this form and it contents.

settings.label: Build Language
settings.description: Select the language this form will be built in

elements.title: Form Access
elements.description: Define the roles that have view and edit access to this form. Roles inherited from trial build.

elements.title: Field Access
elements.description: Define the roles that have view and edit access to fields added to this form. Field access controls are inherited from form access.
